query: "What was the result of my Depression screening using the Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score in August 2018?"
resource_summaries: This record is about a completed procedure for depression screening using the Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score, which took place on August 22, 2018, at a primary care provider location.
answer: The result of your depression screening using the Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score in August 2018 was negative.
